NMDC DataHarmonizer template XXX

Guidelines for submitting metadata about XXX biosamples

Field Description Guidance Examples Data Status

sample identification

required where applicable

optional

required
unique_ID Unique ID Field REQUIRED for ALL sample submission. Options: IGSN- http://www.geosamples.org/getigsn ; UUID- https://www.uuidgenerator.net/ {text} None
samp_name Sample Name ID that is present on the shipped sample. Human readable. {text} None
investigation_type Analysis/Data Type This field is constrained to contain only a set of limited terms (listed under Expected value) that indicate the types of data that were generated. Include all the data types, this field can have multiple values separated by a ; drop down selection list None
package Sample Type MIxS Package {text} None
source_mat_id Source Material ID A unique identifier assigned to an original material sample collected or to any derived sub-samples. The source material should be listed as a sample to inform details about parent material relationship. {text} None
growth_facil Growth Facility Type of facility or location form where the sample was harvested {text}|{termLabel} {[termID]} None
collection_date Collection Date {timestamp} None
samp_mat_process Material Processing {text}|{termLabel} {[termID]} None
store_cond Storage Condition Informs how your sample was stored drop down selection list None
samp_store_temp Storage temperature drop down selection list None
samp_size Sample size {value}{text} None
geo_loc_name Geographical Location Name country or sea name; region or state; specific location None
lat_lon latitude, longitude {latitude decimal; longitude decimal} None
elev elevation-meters {value} None
